name: Absorption Apocalypse: Saratov Takeover of Ternopil
name_original: Absorption Apocalypse: Saratov Takeover of Ternopil
description:
In 2077 there was devastation and anarchy all over the world. There were legends in the world about one dangerous killer who went crazy and began to destroy entire cities. But one day he met his longtime enemies...

All the events in the game are the result of the sick fantasy of the sleepy creators of the game, so don't even try to understand anything.

This game is a pa series  fan project. Original PA was made by 90percentstudios. Almost all music and sprites are from original game, programming by xDevCainozoe. Special thanks to Arochi for help with translating.
